article_title: Peru Names New Prime Minister in Cabinet Shuffle
article_text:
LIMA, Peru--President Ollanta Humala on Monday shuffled his cabinet, replacing officials in the key posts of prime minister and mines and energy minister.

Mr. Humala appointed René Cornejo as his new prime minister, in a cabinet shuffle that included changes to several other posts. Finance Minister Luis Miguel Castilla remained in his position.

Mr. Cornejo becomes the fifth prime minister to serve under President Humala, who...

twitter.description: President Ollanta Humala on Monday shuffled his cabinet, replacing officials in the key posts of prime minister and mines and energy minister following a spat over a minimum wage increase.
twitter.title: Peru Names New Prime Minister in Cabinet Shuffle
